DOC.brief_summary: The study prospective cohort study 20 patient recruit site 's Defibrillator Clinic patient population follow site . Hypothesis : Among available EGM configuration option , one good others detection enhancement purpose .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients must already implanted St. Jude Medical dual chamber ICD dual coil defibrillator lead . 2 . Patients must willing sign inform consent form . 3 . Patients must frequent PVCs ( minimum 30/hour ) 1 . Known history slow VT ( 160 bpm ) . 2 . Patients age 18 year . 3 . Pregnant woman . 4 . Pacemaker dependent rhythm . 5 . Ongoing angina pectoris . 6 . Current NYHA Class 34 heart failure .
